Sons who inherit the altered gene will have the condition, while daughters who inherit the altered gene will be carriers.  A characteristic of X-linked inheritance is that fathers cannot pass X-linked traits to their sons.",GHR,"Ohdo syndrome, Maat-Kievit-Brunner type"
